abstract: The board of independent movie studio Lionsgate has unanimously rejected the latest hostile takeover bid from activist investor Carl C. Icahn.
snippet: The board of independent movie studio Lionsgate has unanimously rejected the latest hostile takeover bid from activist investor Carl C. Icahn.
lead_paragraph: The board of the independent movie studio Lions Gate Entertainment has unanimously rejected the latest hostile takeover bid from the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn.

headline.main: Once Again, Lions Gate Rebuffs Icahn
